text: John Clifford Otto (1948 â€“ August 1, 2020) was an American Republican politician. He was a member of the Texas House of Representatives from District 18 from 2004 to 2017. He was born in Dayton, Texas. Otto died on August 1, 2020 in Dayton, Texas at the age of 71. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Texas Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Members of the Texas Legislature
